string.name: name
string.value: A Guard's Third Assignment: Maintaining Warning Signs
Looks as if there is another assignment for the #m102000000# Guard. Find out what it is from #b#p1040001##k at the #b#m106000300##k.

#p1040001# says that safety requires taking precautions and asks that you review the information in the warning signs located between #bEast Rocky Mountain I#k and #bEast Domain of Perion#k, and fix any mistakes... It's been a while since they were checked. \r\n\r\n#bCheck on all 5 warning signs located in East Rocky Mountain 1, Rocky Road I, Rocky Road 2, Rocky Road 3, and East Domain of Perion.#k
You wrote down the monsters displayed in all of the Warning Signs.
Evan, do you know what a Guard's most important job is? It's to prevent incidents before they happen. To do that, we've posted warning signs throughout #m102000000#.

But we have to keep them up to date. Monsters often change their locations, so we have to continually update the signs. I'd like to check the information on the signs posted between #bEast Rocky Montain 1#k and #bEast Domain of Perion#k. Got it?
It seems complicated but it's not. Simply go find the five Warning Signs located in the section I mentioned and click on them to read them. All you have to do is to fix the mistakes.
How could you refuse? It's really quite simple... Please rethink your decision.
Wow, have you finished updating the Warning Signs? Great job! You probably now totally know your way around #m102000000#. #p1040000# still gets lost in #m100000000#...
Thanks. I'll call you if there is something else to do. I'll also let you know if anything strange happens, like #p1040000# mentioned.
Haven't updated the Warning Signs yet? Find all 5 Warning Signs located between #bEast Rocky Mountain 1 and East Domain of Perion#k. After that you just have to follow the instructions on the signs.
Are you having a hard time because you don't know the geography? Just press the #bW#k key to open the World Map.
